name: Deltarune Gamerune Chara Dreemurr Battle (Demo)
description:
Sezuire Warning

Hi

In this Demo you play as Asriel Dreemurr. After Asriel broke the barrier and everyone  left the underground for the surface Gamerune Chara appears to take his Soul for someone. You must fight Gamerune Chara to save Asriel's Soul and stop Gamerune Chara's plan!

Thank you and please support me.
Follow me on Twitter: @FantasyRuinX
